item.title: Robinhood gets a downgrade from Wolfe Research as upside potential is priced in
item.description: The online trading platform, which has more than tripled in the last 12 months, is trading at a lofty valuation, per Wolfe Research.

item.title: Jefferies upgrades Wynn Resorts, says casino giant can rally more than 30%
item.description: Wynn Resorts will see upsides from its Al Marjan Island development and recovering Macau market, per Jefferies.

item.title: From tariffs to DOGE, what companies are saying about the impact of MAGA policies
item.description: See how companies are responding to the major themes of Trump's campaign and early days in office.

item.title: Gen Alpha's obsessions are already driving more than $5 trillion in spending. The stocks UBS expects to benefit
item.description: An estimated $5.39 trillion is spent annually on Gen Alpha as of 2024, and is projected surge past $5.46 trillion by 2029, per to research firm McCrin...

item.title: Tesla and GameStop make the list of best stocks to short, according to Wolfe Research
item.description: Tesla and GameStop are among the names Wolfe Research is recommending that investors short to avoid the hit of potential blow-ups.
